name: CozyDrive
description:
made for winter melon jam 2022 https://itch.io/jam/winter-melonjam-2022

When I thought about what I find cozy I remembered playing Pokémon games on my Nintendo ds on the backseat while my dad drove me around. I find this very cozy.

made with unity.

controls:

a to throw out your hook, b to return your hook

be careful when opening the game, it might be very loud
